practice_phrases.known: 我想认识会说英语的人。
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people who speak English.
People who speak English want to learn.

practice_phrases.known: 我和会说英语的人说话。
practice_phrases.target: I speak with people who speak English.

practice_phrases.known: 我想和会说英语的人练习。
practice_phrases.target: I want to practise with people who speak English.

practice_phrases.known: 会说英语的人在帮助我。
practice_phrases.target: People who speak English are helping me.

practice_phrases.known: 我今天晚上想认识会说英语的人。
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people who speak English this evening.

practice_phrases.known: 我猜会说英语的人说得很好。
practice_phrases.target: I guess people who speak English speak very well.

practice_phrases.known: 因为我想学习，所以我和会说英语的人说话。
practice_phrases.target: Because I want to learn, I speak with people who speak English.

practice_phrases.known: 我在尽力和会说英语的人一起练习。
practice_phrases.target: I'm trying to practise with people who speak English as hard as I can.

practice_phrases.known: 我很快就要开始和会说英语的人说话了。
practice_phrases.target: I'm going to start speaking with people who speak English soon.
